name: The Celestial Alliance
description: A faction that believes in unity, cooperation, and the pursuit of knowledge for the betterment of all.

name: The Orion Syndicate
description: A faction focused on personal gain, power, and influence through any means necessary.

name: The Nouveau Renaissance
description: A faction dedicated to the preservation and advancement of art, culture, and self-expression.

name: The Quantum Collective
description: A faction that embraces technology, innovation, and the push for scientific breakthroughs.

name: The Equilibrium Initiative
description: A faction that seeks balance, harmony, and sustainability in all aspects of life.
